title: Package Receiving, Vinyl Plank Flooring, Microwave, and so much more!!
posting_body: Welcome Home to Stone Garden on Birch.
Located just 3 minutes from Cherry Creek and nearby the Denver Tech Center and downtown is our Stone Garden on Birch Apartments.
These residences offer stylish living at an affordable price.
With new paint, windows, doors, and iron work the exterior and features of this building are brand new!

We are proud of our professionally rebuilt courtyard which features grills, professionally landscaped planter beds, elegant pavers, a large dog park (as all of our apartments are pet friendly), and seating for everything from peacefully reading a book to a fun, social gathering.
Not only have we significantly updated the exterior of our apartment building, the interior updates are arguably even more impressive!
Brand new floors, appliances, kitchens, cabinets, ceilings, and bathrooms, the plethora of new features gives off a very upscale vibe to these apartments.
The details are very important to us and from high-end lighting to custom tile work, we’ve put in the work to make our apartments feel slick and a place you are proud to show your friends and family!
Let us welcome you home to Stone Garden on Birch.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
